description.narrative: - Provide long-term financing on terms not generally available: Long term funding is important to reduce term mismatch risk in mortgages. The IFC transaction is thus expected to provide long-term funding with a tenor and amount that is not generally available in the local capital markets. - Broadening Funding Source: The project will assist La Nacional to diversify its funding structure which is based on savings and term deposits.

The proposed investment consists of: i) a local currency loan of approximately 190 million Dominican Pesos (up to $5 million equivalent); and ii) a Partial Credit Guarantee of up to a 400 million Dominican Pesos ($10.5 million equivalent) for Asociación La Nacional de Ahorros y Préstamos para la Vivienda (La Nacional or the Company) to be used to fund lending activity in the middle-low income mortgage sector (La Nacional or the Project). Asociación La Nacional operates commercially as mutual savings and loans focused on providing mortgage loans for middle-low income housing and, to a lesser extent, SME and consumer loans. The Company operates in urban and rural regions throughout 47 branches, 36% of which are located in provinces outside the two main urban areas where banking penetration is especially low.

participating-org.narrative: ASOCIACION LA NACIONAL DE AHORROS Y PRESTAMOS

mailing-address.narrative: Mr. Gustavo Zuluaga Executive and Business Vice President Asociación La Nacional de Ahorros y Préstamos para la Vivienda Av. 27 de Febrero No. 218 Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic Telephone: +1-809-688-6631 Fax: +1-809-987-6072 Website: http://www.alnap.com.do

name.narrative: La Nacional is headquartered in Santo Domingo and has 47 branches across the Dominican Republic. The company is expected to provide mortgage loans for middle-low income housing (houses of up to $60,000) and, furthermore, expand its lending operations by supporting its nationwide expansion strategy in the Dominican Financial Markets.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.
